pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===================Wildbook IA - utool===================|Build| |Pypi| |ReadTheDocs|Useful Utility Tools For You! - Part of the WildMe / Wildbook IA Project.Notice: This is a "kitchen sink" library. While it is still somewhat maintained, it should be considered "end-of-life". Please see https://github.com/Erotemic/ubelt and https://github.com/Erotemic/xdevfor a well-maintained curated collection of utilities.----The `utool` library is a collection of tools that I've found useful. I'vewritten most of them from scratch, but there are a few I've taken or partiallytaken from StackOverflow. References are given in most locations.In my experience the most useful functions in this library are:* `utool.flatten`* `utool.take`* `utool.take_column`* `utool.compress`* `utool.ichunks`* `utool.itertwo`* `utool.isiterable`* `utool.group_items`* `utool.dict_subset`* `utool.dict_hist`* `utool.map_dict_vals`* `utool.map_dict_keys`* `utool.memoize`* `utool.get_argflag`* `utool.get_argval`* `utool.ProgIter`* `utool.Timer`* `utool.Timerit`* `utool.MemoryTracker`* `utool.InteractiveIter`* `utool.color_print`* `utool.ensuredir`* `utool.glob`* `utool.grep`* `utool.sed`* `utool.ls`* `utool.repr2`Installation--------------Installation can now be done via pypi.. code:: bash pip install wbia-utool.. |Build| image:: https://img.shields.io/github/workflow/status/WildMeOrg/wbia-utool/Build%20and%20upload%20to%20PyPI/main :target: https://github.com/WildMeOrg/wbia-utool/actions?query=branch%3Amain+workflow%3A%22Build+and+upload+to+PyPI%22 :alt: Build and upload to PyPI (main).. |Pypi| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/wbia-utool.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/wbia-utool :alt: Latest PyPI version.. |ReadTheDocs| image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/wbia-utool/badge/?version=latest :target: http://wbia-utool.readthedocs.io/en/latest/ :alt: Documentation on ReadTheDocs
